Generic Network Systems | Linux System Engineer | New York City, NY | ONSITE | www.gnetsys.net

Generic Network Systems (GNS) is a top-tier, boutique managed services/hosting company primarily for investment firms. We manage servers all over the world from our NYC and Portland, Oregon offices. We have an excellent reputation for our proactive support.

We provide expert systems administration for client-owned servers, servers in the GNS private cloud (consisting of 7 collocation sites) and servers in the Amazon Web Services cloud.

We are looking for a Linux Systems Administrator who will work in our fast paced team environment providing support, design and development for our data centers. The ideal candidate must be a self-starter possessing sound judgement, strong problem solving skills and able to communicate effectively with a broad range of audiences.

Apply at http://www.gnetsys.net/careers
